post1.quoteDescription: “We don't just sell websites, we create websites that SELL.”
post1.author: Dr. Christopher Dayagdag

post2.quoteDescription: “A successful website does three things: It attracts the right kinds of visitors. Collect Contact details for future ongoing relation.”
post2.author: Mohamed Saad

post3.quoteDescription: “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.”
post3.author: Nelson Mandela

post4.quoteDescription: “The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character — that is the goal of true education.”
post4.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

post5.quoteDescription: “Strength is Life, Weakness is Death. Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death.Love is Life, Hatred is Death.”
post5.author: Swami Vivekananda
